doc.description: module for reading pressure servo potentiometer data

configure.name: ADC_CHANNEL_POTENTIOMETER_LEFT
configure.description: choose which ADC is used for servo potentiometer

configure.name: ADC_CHANNEL_POTENTIOMETER_RIGHT
configure.description: choose which ADC is used for servo potentiometer

makefile.raw: ADC_CHANNEL_POTENTIOMETER_LEFT ?= ADC_7 ADC_CHANNEL_POTENTIOMETER_RIGHT ?= ADC_3 POT_ADC_FLAGS = -DADC_CHANNEL_POTENTIOMETER_LEFT=$(ADC_CHANNEL_POTENTIOMETER_LEFT) -DUSE_$(ADC_CHANNEL_POTENTIOMETER_LEFT) POT_ADC_FLAGS += -DADC_CHANNEL_POTENTIOMETER_RIGHT=$(ADC_CHANNEL_POTENTIOMETER_RIGHT) -DUSE_$(ADC_CHANNEL_POTENTIOMETER_RIGHT) ap.CFLAGS += $(POT_ADC_FLAGS)
